text: David S. Olsen (born September 13, 1988) is a former Republican member of the Illinois House of Representatives. He was appointed to the 81st district seat in August 2016 by Republican party leaders in DuPage and Will counties following the resignation of Ron Sandack. In 2018, Olsen narrowly lost reelection to Democratic candidate Anne Stava- Murray.https://www.dailyherald.com/news/20181106/stava-murray-beats-olsen- in-81st-house-race In 2019, Olsen ran for mayor of Downers Grove, but lost. He was also the Vice Chair of the College of DuPage Board of Trustees, a position to which he was appointed in 2016 by Illinois Community College Board Chairman Lazaro Lopez. ==References== == External links == * Profile at Illinois General Assembly Category:Living people Category:People from Downers Grove, Illinois Category:Illinois Republicans Category:Members of the Illinois House of Representatives Category:21st-century American politicians Category:1988 births
title: David S. Olsen
